segments.text: Hello , Fairbrook Consulting , how may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is Julianne Horton , and I ’ m calling to arrange an appointment with Ms . McNeal .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , what day were you thinking of ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How ’ s Thursday ? Does she have any time available then ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Um . . . let me double check . . . unfortunately , she ’ s booked solid on Thursday , how does next Monday work for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I ’ Ve got something scheduled on Monday.Can she do Tuesday ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , Tuesday ’ s perfect . May I ask where you ’ re calling from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , actually , Tuesday ’ s no good . Sorry about that .
segments.speaker: S1
